eekata hethuwa saralawa kiwwoth kronkrit ekak dammama eeka athule thapadayaka prathikriya siddha wenawa(simenthi wala kalsiyam kabanetuyi jalayayi athara)..ee kiyanne rasne pitawenawa kiyala saralawa kiyamuko..me hinda kronkrit eke kraks(irithalim) enawa...malli dakala athi kronkrit ekak dammama wathuren themapu goni walin wahanawa..wathura ihinawa wage dewal..ehema karanne thapadayaka prathikiya awama karaganna..dam ekak wage hadaddi kraks gana sahenna salakilimath wenna oona..mokada ee haraha wathura kandu wena hinda..kraks athiwena eka 100% nawathnna ba..eeth wiwidha upakrama yodala eeka awama karaganna puluwan..ee sadaha yodapu upakramayak widihata thamayi ayis wathuren kronkrit anala thiyenne..ayis wathura bhawitha kirime thawath aramunu thiyenna puluwan..mama danne ara hethuwa nisa kiyala witharayi..oya aart karanawa kiyapu nisa mama puluwan widihata saralawa kiwwa..therenna athi kiyala hithanawa..

ape ratata obage athapewim anawashyayayi kolambaa kotuwe sita kilinochchiya bala dhawanaya wu dayata kirula shighraghami dumriyen kilinochchiya bala gaman gath chanal 4 nalikawe pradhani kalan makre mahathata wirodhaya dakwamin anuradhapura janathawa kiya sitiya ha.kalan makre mahatha athulu pirisa kolambaa kotuwe sita kilinochchiya bala dhawanaya wu dayata kirula sighragami dumriya anuradhapura pradhana dumriya sthanaye palamuwana wedikawata paminena thuru anuradhapura nagaraye rajya sewakayan paudgalika sewakayan manthriwarun athulu wishala janathawak wirodhatha puwaruda sahithawa udasana sita bala sitiya ha.anuradhapura dumriya sthanayata pamini yal dewi dumriyata ho dayata kirula dumriyata wawniyawa ha kilinochchiya bala yamata awasthawa laba dunne natha.in pasu uthurumada palath bhara jyeshta niyojya polispathi rawi wijegunawardhana, polis adhikari mahesh senarathna mahathwarun pamina kalan makre mahatha samanga sanwadayaka yeduna athara dumriyata wirodhathakaruwan kilinochchiya bala yamata ida nedena nisa nawathath aganuwarata pitathwa yana lesa illimak kaleya.ema illimen anathuruwa kalan makre mahatha athulu pirisa wishesha polis aaraksha madhyaye anuradhapura dumriya sthanayen pitathata pamina kuli wan rathayakin kolambaa bala pitathwa giyaha.in anathuruwa wirodhathakaruwan dumriya sthanayen pitawa giya athara in anathuruwa pramada wu dumriya dekama gaman aarambha wiya.me siduwim siyalla atharathuradi kalan makre mahatha athulu kandayama patigatha karana lada siyaluma darshana antharjalaya haraha brithanyayata yawimata madhya kandayama katayuthu kaleya.ohu ema darshana saha sidu wu siyalu siddhin brithanyayata eemel paniwida mangin yawu bawa madhyawedin samanga pawasiya..
